Name: Fish and Groove
About the game: In Fish and Groove you play as a cat that goes fishing. To catch the fishes he enchants them by playing his banjo. Hit the numerical buttons on the keyboard following the beat to score (and to collect his diner). ORIGINAL CONCEPT A fishing game or a rhythm game? Why not both? RETRO VISUALS Pixel art animations and environments give the game an unique feel for this genre. BEAUTIFUL SONGS Amazing songs composed by Peritune. All inspired by classic Japanese melodies with instruments like the Shamisen.
